name: Intraday Bollinger-OBV Mean Reversion
description: Intraday mean-reversion strategy that trades S&P 500 E-mini futures and highly liquid S&P 500 constituents using Bollinger Band extremes combined with On-Balance-Volume divergence confirmation. Positions are sized via ATR-based volatility targeting, cut with 0.5 % hard stops and 1 % hard targets, and are exited early if price reverts to the 20-period moving average.
